name: openmemory-workspace

scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend" "bun run dev:dashboard"
scripts.build: bun run build:frontend && bun run build:backend
scripts.serve: bun run build && concurrently "bun run serve:backend" "bun run serve:dashboard"
scripts.prisma:push: cd frontend && bunx prisma db push

description: OpenMemory - Long-term memory system for AI agents with Bun workspace for parallel execution
author: OpenMemory Contributors
